UNI Math 2500
Linear Algebra

This is the course web site for Linear Algebra. Here you can find all of the documentation for class, including a syllabus, a calendar, all of the assignments, the class workbook, and the class blog.

Class Blog

I keep a course blog for each section as a record of proceedings and to make announcements. This will often be a simple run-down of what we accomplish.


Class Blog


Workbook

This workbook is the source for our daily work to learn linear algebra. It is written to complement the course text, not replace it. You will read this along with Strang.


Workbook (HTML)


Calendar

This course will keep closely to a pre-planned time line. You can see what to expect for each of our class meetings here, including assessment dates.


Daily Calendar


Policies

Detailed Information about the course and its structure is contained in the syllabus, which is our official policy document. If you have a question, start with this.


Syllabus


Materials

There are many other useful materials for students to learn linear algebra. Here are links to other texts, some video lectures, and a set of excellent YouTube videos.


Supplements


SageMathCloud

Linear algebra is full of necessary visualizations and long tedious computations. For these, we will use the free, cloud-based service SageMathCloud.


SMC
